name.ja: ホールティアの<ruby>蟲<rt>こ</rt></ruby><ruby>惑<rt>わく</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby>

text.en: Special Summon this card in Defense Position as a Normal Monster (Plant/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 400/DEF 2400). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Traptrix" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use 1 "Traptrix Holetaea" effect per turn, and only once that turn. You can activate this card the turn it was Set by discarding 1 Normal Trap.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Forest of the Traptrix Banquet Invitation Pack
